snippet: Operators cited difficulty in scheduling during peak hours for the route between Atlantic City and New York City.
abstract: Casino-sponsored express train service from New York City to Atlantic City ends after three years; officials report that the main reason for discontinuing the service was difficulty in scheduling peak times along the busy New York-to-Philadelphia route.
lead_paragraph: Operators cited difficulty in scheduling during peak hours for the route between Atlantic City and New York City.

headline.seo: Casinos End Atlantic City Train Service
headline.main: Casinos End Train Service After 3 Years
headline.print_headline: Casinos End Train Service After 3 Years
